user.title: Select Your Fan
user.description: Select your Homewerks Smart Fan from the list of discovered devices, or choose to enter the IP address manually.

manual.title: Manual Setup
manual.description:
Enter the IP address of your Homewerks Smart Fan.

To find the IP address, open the **Home NetWerks Connect** app and go to:
**Devices** → ⚙️ (gear icon on your device) → **Speaker Info** → **IP**

reconfigure.title: Update Device IP
reconfigure.description: Select the device to update the IP address for this integration, or choose to enter it manually.

reconfigure_manual.title: Update IP Address
reconfigure_manual.description:
Enter the new IP address for your Homewerks Smart Fan.

To find the IP address, open the **Home NetWerks Connect** app and go to:
**Devices** → ⚙️ (gear icon on your device) → **Speaker Info** → **IP**

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect. Check the IP address and ensure the fan is powered on.

abort.already_configured: This device is already configured. The IP address has been updated.
